articles.description: Vampire: The Masquerade — Bloodhunt launches next week, and developer Sharkmob reached out to us to share a little insight into the trophy list. Here's what the team had to say...
articles.content: Hello TrueTrophies community!We are big fans of collecting trophies and achievements in games. So today, we will share some details about the trophies and achievements in Bloodhunt and our design phi… [+1626 chars]
